Data: Holder to Finch, FOUR runs drawn forward, but can only get a thick edge. Doesn't matter though as it races past the vacant slip cordon. Third man was too square. Finch jabbed at that, but is lucky this time
Holder to Finch, no run hint of extra bounce from length area outside off, bunted to point
Holder to Finch, no run defended to the left of Holder, wants the single thinking he'd hit it to mid-off but quickly realised that wasn't the case
Holder to Finch, no run gets on top of the bounce and pats it back to the bowler
Holder to Finch, no run floats it full on off stump, Finch gets a good stride forward and then offers a dead bat to defend
Holder to Finch, 1 run hustled for pace, and so he isn't entirely in control of the pull, gets a top edge that falls short of fine leg

Brathwaite to Finch, 2 runs he goes wide of the crease and angles this full ball on off, Finch attacks it and lofts it cleanly over extra cover, KP runs to his right and right-boots the ball by the edge of the boundary. Carlos applauds KP's effort
Brathwaite to Finch, FOUR runs cracked! Full on off, Finch plonks his front foot forward and belts it over the bowler's head. Nobody could stop that
Brathwaite to Finch, no run full, off-stump line, dabbed to backward point
Brathwaite to Finch, 1 run Finch uses the incoming angle and glides a single to fine leg
Brathwaite to Smith, no run back of a length and outside off, skip Smith shuffles across, punching to point
Brathwaite to Smith, no run back of a length on off, Smith shuffles across, this time punching to mid-on
Pollard to Finch, 1 run starts off with a 107ks floaty incutter on middle, Finch waits and pokes it out in front of midwicket
Pollard to Smith, 1 run another full offcutter, 110ks, whippy drive to long-on

Pollard to Finch, OUT KP strikes in his first over and nearly does a Tahir, again. He looks towards the stands, perhaps, and does the finger-on-the-lip celebration. The lack of pace does Finch in. Back of a length incutter, comes in from outside off at 115ks, Finch aims to force it from there. This means that he drags a catch to Samuels at deep midwicket
Pollard to Bailey, no run full and cuts in to rap the pad, not given by umpire Kettleborough, looked like it was heading down leg
Pollard to Bailey, FOUR runs full and wide outside off, Bailey chases and sends a bottom edge wide of reach of Ramdin. Beats the diving keeper to his left and rolls away to the fine leg fence
Pollard to Bailey, no run full on off, Bailey presses forward and blocks this roller back to KP
Narine to Smith, 1 run offbreak on off, not much turn, Smith shuffles across and whips to deep midwicket
Narine to Bailey, no run full and breaks in quickly, defended back
Narine to Bailey, no run full and breaks in again, poked in front of short leg
Narine to Bailey, no run spinning into the legs, tucked.... KP intercepts it at short leg
Narine to Bailey, 1 run Bailey hangs back and jabs it away past KP
Narine to Smith, 1 run whipped from off stump through square leg
Pollard to Smith, no run short and wide outside off, chopped to point
Pollard to Smith, no run offcutter short and outside off, whipped to midwicket
Pollard to Smith, no run cutter outside off, forward and bunted to the covers
Pollard to Smith, no run short and wide outside off again, Smith slashes a cut to backward point
Pollard to Smith, 1 run pitched up on off, nudged into the covers for a single
Pollard to Bailey, 1 run back of a length and sticks in the surface outside off, Bailey waits and late-cuts to third man
Narine to Bailey, 1 run Bailey plays back to this offbreak and whips to deep midwicket
Narine to Smith, 1 wide slid down leg, Smith aims to shovel it fine, no dice, wide
Narine to Smith, 2 runs full and straight, no turn, Smith twirls his wrists and puts it away to deep midwicket
Narine to Smith, no run length and breaks in, worked to short fine leg
Narine to Smith, FOUR runs nifty footwork and wristwork. Smith twinkles down to meet a full one outside off. He then whips it over short midwicket
Narine to Smith, FOUR runs Narine loses his rhythm. He fires it quick and short down leg, Smith just helps it squarer of short fine leg
Narine to Smith, 1 run tossed full on middle, picked away through midwicket
Pollard to Smith, no run another little incutter on off, pushed back to KP
Pollard to Smith, 1 run shortish incutter, sticks in the surface and climbs onto Smith, who cuts and chops an inside edge to short fine leg
Pollard to Bailey, no run Bailey whips a full one from off stump to short midwicket
Pollard to Bailey, 1 run short and comes in on off, Bailey camps back and clips to the right of short midwicket for one
Pollard to Smith, no run looped outside off, forward and dabbed to short extra cover
Pollard to Smith, 2 runs pitched up and wide outside off, Smith reaches out, slicing a drive to third man
Narine to Bailey, no run slides full on middle and leg, nudges and misses, as Narine hits the pad
Narine to Bailey, no run Bailey steps out, Narine dragged his length back and found some turn to hit the pad again
Narine to Bailey, FOUR runs Narine drops it short again, this is wide outside off. Bailey shifts his balance to the back foot and cracks a cut to the cover boundary
Narine to Bailey, no run slower and fuller on middle, knocked to the midwicket region
Narine to Bailey, no run short again on off, the batsman steps out and flays it straight to short extra cover
Narine to Bailey, 1 run pushed through a bit short on middle, Bailey hangs back and forces a single to long-on

Brathwaite to Bailey, no run he goes wide of the crease and gets it to veer in sharply from outside off, strikes the pad in front of off and middle. Ump Kettleborough does not budge. Impact in line, yes. Going over the stumps? Oh, the tracker shows that it would have hit middle
Brathwaite to Bailey, no run full and angled in on off, defended back to the bowler
Brathwaite to Bailey, no run full and floated outside off, defended to the covers
Brathwaite to Bailey, no run full and angled in on middle, blocked out
Brathwaite to Bailey, no run full and aimed at off, Bailey blocks it to the covers
Brathwaite to Bailey, no run Bailey reaches out and pushes this full ball to point. He plays out a maiden
Benn to Smith, no run lobs a full toss on middle, squeezed back to the bowler
Benn to Smith, 1 run very full on middle, jabbed to sweeper cover for one
Benn to Bailey, no run down the track and quietly defended to cover
Benn to Bailey, no run Benn goes short and outside off, allows Bailey to rock back. Cut to short extra cover
Benn to Bailey, no run drifts in on middle, Bailey answers with a straight bat and blocks

Benn to Bailey, no run turn and bounce! Skirts past the outside edge of the groping bat. Drifts in on off and turns away late, Bailey had to play at it. He is beaten emphatically. This should encourage Benn, as well as Zampa. Ramdin takes it just below his chest
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run length and outside off, helped down to third man for one
Brathwaite to Bailey, no run inducker, Bailey plays back and squirts an inside snick onto the pad
Brathwaite to Bailey, no run full and angled in at off, Bailey closes the bat-face and defends to the midwicket region
Brathwaite to Bailey, no run Carlos pulls his length back on off, Bailey hops and stabs to short extra cover
Brathwaite to Bailey, no run yikes! This indipper kept low and outside off, beats the inside edge. Bailey reaches out, cuts and misses
Brathwaite to Bailey, no run Good variation. Carlos drags this shorter and offers not much width outside off, Bailey responds by getting on top of the bounce and punching to short extra cover
Benn to Smith, 1 run tossed on off, dropped into the covers for one
Benn to Bailey, 1 run forced past short extra cover for one as Bailey gets a run, after playing out 15 dots
Benn to Smith, 1 run down the track and driven to long-on
Benn to Bailey, 2 runs now it's Bailey's turn to dance out and milk it down the ground, for two
Benn to Bailey, no run pushed to short extra cover, straight to the fielder
Benn to Bailey, no run drifts in and strays into the thigh, Bailey goes back and does not connect with the flick
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run whipped around the corner to deep square leg
Brathwaite to Bailey, no run length and outside off, forward and bunted to short extra cover
Brathwaite to Bailey, 1 run shorter and outside off, Bailey aims to pull. Ends up dragging a single to deep midwicket
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run sharp incutter, Smith seeks to cut, the ball does not come on. He chops an inside edge that whistles past the leg stump
Brathwaite to Bailey, 2 runs back of a length and outside off, Bailey waits, waits, waits, and glides it to third man
Brathwaite to Bailey, 1 run short and outside off, Bailey rides it down to third man
Benn to Bailey, no run drift back in followed by sharp turn, Bailey is beaten in flight as he skips out, blocks it somehow in the end
Benn to Bailey, 1 run cuts but can't find the gap as he hits it straight to point, almost a mix-up but no damage done as Smith scampers through
Benn to Smith, 2 runs steps out and works it across the line towards deep midwicket, Johnson Charles was caught napping
Benn to Smith, 1 run backs away, uses the width and cuts it to deep point
Benn to Bailey, 1 run driven inside-out to sweeper cover, much better from the Smiling George
Benn to Smith, 2 runs once again, hint of width is enough for Smith to work the ball into the gap towards deep point and come back for the second

Brathwaite to Bailey, OUT got him! Bailey was just starting to tick over, but the slightest of mistakes has cost him. Brathwaite bowls an incoming length ball which Bailey looks to run it down to third man, but there wasn't much room to work with as he ends up chopping it back onto the stumps. The squeeze was on, you got the feeling that Bailey was getting a little edgy to score after a string of dots early on in his innings, but that isn't to be to
Brathwaite to Marsh, no run shows the full face of the bat to defend
Brathwaite to Marsh, no run gets half-forward and defends again
Brathwaite to Marsh, no run straightens off length outside off, bunted to point
Brathwaite to Marsh, no run solidly behind the line again as he defends to the off side, Brathwaite isn't giving anything away either
Brathwaite to Marsh, no run drives, but plays outside the line and gets an inside edge that rolls back to the bowler. Wicket maiden
Benn to Smith, 1 run touch short, he makes room and crunches it to deep point

Benn to Marsh, no run And he nearly had him with a beauuuuuty!! This one drifts back in from around the stumps, hits something and then turns square to beat Marsh's outside edge by a whisker. Benn thought there was an edge, but there wasn't here. Anyway, it didn't matter as Ramdin didn't collect it cleanly
Benn to Marsh, 1 run quicker one on middle, gets back to defend
Benn to Smith, no run this one straightens from middle, he gets back to work it across the line but is late on the shot
Benn to Smith, 1 run opens the face of the bat to ease it wide of point for an easy single
Benn to Marsh, 1 run gets a leading edge that rolls towards mid-off
Brathwaite to Marsh, FOUR runs driven on the up, and that has raced away into the cover boundary at the rate of knots. Too much width, Marsh frees his arms to belt that on the up!
Brathwaite to Marsh, 1 run uppish, but the edge falls safely into no man's land, third man comes around to stop that. Marsh on 999
Brathwaite to Smith, no run gets across to defend gently to the off side
Brathwaite to Smith, no run floats that full on off stump, Smith shuffles across and taps it to cover
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run worked off his pads into the gap at deep midwicket, wanted the second but the throw was a quick one at the bowler's end

Brathwaite to Marsh, 1 run dabbed with soft hands towards point, but he really had to scamper through to complete the run as he was pushed onto the backfoot, which meant he had an extra yard or two to make up. No damage done in the end as there was no direct hit
Benn to Marsh, no run lovely flight, lands it on middle, driven with the spin with hard hands to cover
Benn to Marsh, 1 run worked across the line to long-on
Benn to Smith, no run short, he gets back, makes room and cuts it, but straight to cover
Benn to Smith, 1 run too full this time, Smith gives it a proper thump that is half-stopped by Darren Bravo at cover
Benn to Marsh, no run lunges forward and smothers the spin
Benn to Marsh, 1 run slow turn from outside off, crunched to deep cover
Gabriel to Marsh, FOUR runs width on offer, he gets on top of the bounce and cuts it behind point. No chance for third man. Not an auspicious start from Gabriel
Gabriel to Marsh, no run hits the deck hard and gets some lift, Marsh is well inside the crease as he bunts it to the off side
Gabriel to Marsh, 1 wide width on offer, Marsh shapes to play a square drive but can't reach the delivery, easy call for the umpire
Gabriel to Marsh, 1 run mistimed drive but he'll get a one, sweeper cover comes in to cut that off

Gabriel to Smith, FOUR runs too full, in the slot for Smith to lean forward, open the bat face and slice that into the gap behind point. Sweeper cover fielder Johnson Charles tried hard, but couldn't get across in time. Such was the timing on the stroke.
Gabriel to Smith, 1 run eased down to third man for an easy single
Gabriel to Marsh, no run too short, Marsh mistimes an attempted cut to cover
Benn to Smith, no run gets forward and plays it with the spin to cover
Benn to Smith, 1 run chops it between cover and point for a quick single

Benn to Marsh, FOUR runs not all that short, but Marsh still manages to find the gap behind point. Quality stroke. There was just a hint of width, and Marsh converted an inch into an acre. Played it really late and picked the gap to perfection
Benn to Marsh, no run gets forward and bunts it back down the pitch
Benn to Marsh, no run gets half-forward to ease that quicker one to the off side
Benn to Marsh, 1 run driven with the spin to deep cover
Gabriel to Marsh, 1 run plants his frontfoot forward and eases that on the up to deep cover

Gabriel to Smith, OUT Christmas has come early for Gabriel after what was a horror spell until now. Rang long hop this one - too short - and Smith tries to fetch the pull from outside off when he could have easily looked to cut that behind point, gets a top edge and Marlon Samuels gleefully accepts the dolly at midwicket. Smith knew he was dead the moment he hit that. A hint of extra bounce on this surface also played its part.
Gabriel to Maxwell, no run this one's nice and full outside off, watched through to the keeper
Gabriel to Maxwell, no run flew off an open blade to point, good work there

Gabriel to Maxwell, FOUR runs edged, but safe! Doesn't carry to Ramdin, who spontaneously moved to his left. The ball was dying on him though as it races away off the deflection into the third man boundary. Can't blame Ramdin there. Maxwell looked to run that down a lot squarer. Lucky break

Gabriel to Maxwell, OUT another one bites the dust. Gabriel didn't celebrate Smith's wicket, but that isn't the case now as he roars in delight. This one's an incoming length ball that nips back in a touch from the off stump, Maxwell misses the line completely and is struck plumb in front of leg stump Possibly a big moment in the match!
Narine to Marsh, no run slow turn back into middle and leg, Marsh is struck high on the pad as he looks to work it to the on side
Narine to Marsh, no run turned with the spin to short midwicket
Narine to Marsh, 1 run touch fuller on middle, worked off the backfoot to deep midwicket
Narine to Wade, no run beaten on the drive. He plays for the turn but the ball skids straight on, well stopped by Ramdin
Narine to Wade, 1 leg bye didn't pick the straighter one that drift back into middle and leg to hit him high on the pad
Narine to Marsh, 1 run played off the backfoot to long-on. Eventful over
Gabriel to Marsh, no run full and aimed at off, pushed back to Gabriel
Gabriel to Marsh, no run even fuller on off, driven firmly to mid-off
Gabriel to Marsh, FOUR runs pitched up and on off, sort of stops on Marsh. He is through with the lofted drive. Ends up chipping it over mid-off. The ball rolls away for four
Gabriel to Marsh, 1 run full and straight, whipped to mid-on
Gabriel to Wade, 1 run full ball at off, Wade shuffles across off and clips it to midwicket
Gabriel to Marsh, no run good length and angled in on off at 143ks, defended back to Gabriel
Narine to Wade, no run lobbed up on off, Wade defends to silly point
Narine to Wade, no run may have been a knuckle ball, curls in, Wade smothers it to the leg side
Narine to Wade, no run Wade pre-meditates a sweep, Narine alters his length and pushes full outside off. Wade adjusts and drives to the covers
Narine to Wade, no run a touch shorter, punched to the covers
Narine to Wade, no run loopier on middle, Wade bends forward in defence
Narine to Wade, no run round-armish full ball on middle, Wade keeps it out and rounds off a maiden
Benn to Marsh, no run slides outside off with extra bounce, defeats the attempted cut. Bounces into the gloves of Ramdin
Benn to Marsh, no run pushed through on off, defended
Benn to Marsh, no run length ball on middle, half-forward and pushes to short extra cover
Benn to Marsh, no run shorter and drifts in to cramp Marsh for room, mis-timed into short extra cover
Benn to Marsh, 1 run tossed full on off, driven down to long-off to break the sequence of 11 dots
Benn to Wade, no run dangled up full and outside off, not much turn, Wade stretches forward for a sweep across the line and only meets with thin air
Narine to Marsh, 1 run whipped off the pads through midwicket
Narine to Wade, no run dropped short and outside off, stands tall and punches to the covers
Narine to Wade, 3 runs darted outside off, Wade cuts and rolls an outside edge behind point for three
Narine to Marsh, no run slid through short on off, camps back and pushes to mid-on
Narine to Marsh, 1 run offbreak on off, fraction short, punched to long-on off the back foot
Narine to Wade, no run slider on middle, Wade aimed to back away and is cramped for room. Kept out
Benn to Marsh, no run full and drifts in, stabbed to the covers
Benn to Marsh, no run arm-ball, snakes in, chopped back off an inside edge
Benn to Marsh, 1 run short and turns away outside off, forced to sweeper cover
Benn to Wade, 1 run back of a length and turns in, nudged towards square leg

Benn to Marsh, OUT Chopped on! The bails are sent flying. Having gone wicketless on Friday, Benn nips out Marsh. Pushed through quicker, 90.4ks, and turns away from the right hander. He has a lazy waft away from the body after stepping back and chops it onto the stumps via an inside edge. The WI fans are dancing and grooving in the stands
Benn to Starc, no run Benn greets Starc with a yorker, he drops his bat down in time and survives
Narine to Wade, 1 run Wade bends and pre-mediates a sweep, hit from off stump to short fine leg
Narine to Starc, no run offbreak outside off, left alone
Narine to Starc, no run slider on off, punched to mid-off
Narine to Starc, FOUR runs tossed full on off, Starc winds up for a swipe and ends up skying it straighter for four
Narine to Starc, 1 run knuckle ball, Narine special, whipped to long-on
Narine to Wade, 1 run full knuckle ball, Wade drives and squirts an inside edge behind square
Benn to Wade, no run tossed outside off, dabbed to point
Benn to Wade, 1 run Wade picks it from the off stump and sweeps a single to fine leg
Benn to Starc, no run tossed up and drifts in, poked to the covers off an inside edge
Benn to Starc, 1 leg bye fired into the leg stump, cramps Starc, deflected to short fine leg
Benn to Wade, no run flighted and spins in, forward and pushed back to Benn
Benn to Wade, FOUR runs Wade leans back and square-cuts this short ball from outside off to the point fence. Australia need more of this
Narine to Starc, 2 runs round-arm full ball outside off, carved off the back foot to short third man, where Fletcher fumbles. Lazy to bend down and collect the ball
Narine to Starc, no run knuckle ball slides in, played back to the bowler
Narine to Starc, 1 run floater on off, Starc has a big swing at it and toe-ends it...... It drops in front of wide long-off. Charles din't quite attack the ball
Narine to Wade, no run tossed on middle, Wade stretches forward and paddles to short fine leg
Narine to Wade, 2 runs kncukle ball drifting down leg, tickled to short fine leg, where Gabriel makes a diving save, and takes some pace off the ball
Narine to Wade, 1 wide leg-side wide
Narine to Wade, no run looped up full on middle, dead-batted
Benn to Starc, no run shortish on off, camps back and defends
Benn to Starc, no run dipping full toss on the leg stump, misses the flick and takes it on the pad
Benn to Starc, 1 wide fired down leg, wide
Benn to Starc, 1 bye speared outside off, Starc aims for a slog sweep and is beaten, as is Ramdin
Benn to Wade, 1 run short and spins in, cramping Wade. He shapes to pull and ends up flapping it ungainly over midwicket
Benn to Starc, 1 run straighter one, which is pushed down to long-off
Benn to Wade, 1 run Benn liberally tosses this up outside off, Wade presses forward and eases a single to long-off
Narine to Wade, 2 runs very full on middle, driven through the covers for a couple
Narine to Wade, 1 run Wade pre-meditates a sweep, floater on off, he intended to go finer. Ends up hitting the ball through square leg
Narine to Starc, no run pushed through, round-arm action, chopped to the off side
Narine to Starc, no run Narine lobs this offbreak outside off, Starc has a mighty mow across the line. Slog sweep and a miss
Narine to Starc, no run full and straight, stabbed through the covers
Narine to Starc, no run he whirls down a quicker straighter one outside off. Zips past the outside edge
Holder to Wade, no run lifter angled away outside off, Wade drops his gloves on it and sways his upper body out of the way
Holder to Wade, 1 run back of a length on middle, Wade uses his wrists and manipulates it towards the short midwicket region. A clean grab and a throw from Holder could have had Wadea
Holder to Starc, no run awaycutter outside off, short, slapped to point
Holder to Starc, 1 run length ball on leg stump, heaved to fine leg
Holder to Wade, 1 run rushing short ball on off, pulled to deep midwicket
Holder to Starc, 1 run yorker veers in, Starc drops his bat down and toe-ends it behind square
Narine to Starc, no run cuts, but finds point
Narine to Starc, 1 wide fires it wide outside off, Starc shapes to cut but can't reach the delivery

Narine to Starc, SIX runs as clean as it can get! Chips down the track, gets to the pitch and swings across the line. Excellent use of the bottom hand to get the elevation, and that flew into the crowd at deep midwicket. Wow
Narine to Starc, no run mistimes a cut again, straight to point

Narine to Starc, OUT first wicket for Narine, he has his revenge this time. Nothing wrong with the legality of the delivery. He tosses it up generously, the ball spins away sharply and beats Starc's wild swing. In trying to slog again, Starc was outside the crease as Ramdin collected the ball cleanly and whipped the bails off in a jiffy, with the backfoot a good couple of yards out.
Narine to Coulter-Nile, 3 runs cleverly done! Gets back into the crease, opens the bat face and plays it really late, past short third man. Super touch, super timing
Narine to Wade, 1 run drifts into middle, driven down to long-on. End of Narine's spell
Holder to Wade, 1 wide too full, but well down leg. Wade misses a faint tickle, Holder will have to bowl that one again
Holder to Wade, FOUR runs pulled well, that's a top shot! Gets on top of the bounce and helps it behind deep backward square. Bisected the gap to perfection
Holder to Wade, no run cuts, but straight to short third man. A metre on either side and it was four
Holder to Wade, 1 run angles a yorker-length delivery across Wade, who squeezes it wide of the keeper for a quick single
Holder to Coulter-Nile, 1 run chops that down to third man for an easy single
Holder to Wade, 1 run goes for a full-blooded drive, gets a thick inside-edge that rolls to long-off, called for two but that was clearly a case of sheer optimism
Holder to Coulter-Nile, 1 run full toss on the pads, worked behind square on the leg side, they thought about the second briefly before giving up the idea
Pollard to Coulter-Nile, 1 run angles a slower one into the pads from wide of the crease, he chips it over the infield to the man coming in from deep midwicket
Pollard to Wade, 1 run slower one again, slapped to Charles at long-off

Pollard to Coulter-Nile, FOUR runs easy pickings for NCN! Fine leg and third man were up, which meant Pollard couldn't really drift too much on either side. This one's a juicy half-volley on the pads, which he clips past short fine leg

Pollard to Coulter-Nile, 1 run How did Ramdin miss the stumps from a couple of yards? I really don't know. Coulter-Nile squeezes a yorker behind the stumps and takes off, Ramdin does the difficult job of running in and then picks the ball up with one hand and fires an underarm throw which misses the stumps by a long way. The batsman was nowhere in the picture
Pollard to Wade, 1 wide floats the slower ball down leg, easy call
Pollard to Wade, 1 run works it back past the bowler to mid-off

Pollard to Coulter-Nile, 2 runs catching opportunity, but no one takes it. He looked to swing, got it high in the air but the ball fell in no man's land even as two fielders came running in from the leg side boundary - one from deep midwicket and another from deep square leg
Holder to Wade, no run angles a full-length delivery outside off, Wade fails to get some bat on it
Holder to Wade, 1 run walks across to paddle, gets it high on the pad and only a run will result as short fine leg stops it
Holder to Coulter-Nile, 2 runs makes some room to swing over midwicket, gets a thick inside edge towards deep square, aggressive running gives them the second
Holder to Coulter-Nile, no run backs away to carve one over point, but Holder did well by bowling it full and wide outside off, NCN could only watch it through to the keeper in the end

Holder to Coulter-Nile, OUT swung in the air, this goes miles in the air, Bravo settles underneath that at mid-on and takes the skier without much fuss. Coulter-Nile went across the line even as the bat face turned in his hand, which meant there wasn't much power generated behind the stroke. Easy as they come for Bravo
Holder to Wade, no run drives, but gets it high on the bat, stopped by cover
Pollard to Zampa, 1 run slow off-cutter that has been bunted wide of point to bring Wade back on strike
Pollard to Wade, 1 run swung across the line, doesn't time it well, long-on comes in to cut that off
Pollard to Zampa, 1 run into the blockhole from wide of the crease, Zampa squeezes it wide of point for another quick single
Pollard to Wade, SIX runs clean strike, what a beauty! This one was full and angling across, Wade swung across the line and saw that sail over long-on. Boom!
Pollard to Wade, 1 run drills one down to long-on, wanted the second but he hit it too well

Pollard to Zampa, no run beaten by the slower one. Cany variations again, rolls his fingers over the ball and lands it just around off stump, Zampa was through with the stroke even before the ball arrived and missed. Not far away from the stumps
Holder to Wade, 1 wide terrible delivery, high full toss but well outside off. Wade can't reach

Holder to Wade, SIX runs wow, he's hit that superbly. This one was full and angling across, Wade once again went cross-batted across the line, and Wade used his bottom hand to swing across the line and hammer it over deep midwicket
Holder to Wade, 1 run driven to the man at the edge of the circle at cover, gem of an innings from Wade under the circumstances
Holder to Zampa, no run dabbed back to the bowler, some lift off the deck from the length area on off stump on that occasion
Holder to Zampa, 2 runs clean strike over cover, but there's a sweeper circling around the ropes to keep it down to just two
Holder to Zampa, 1 run slapped down the ground, straight to long-on
Holder to Wade, 1 run yorker-length ball angling away, swung across the line, he manages to squeeze it to deep midwicket
Brathwaite to Wade, 2 runs low full toss outside off, Wade reaches out to squeeze it into the gap at deep point
Brathwaite to Wade, 2 runs down on one knee as he makes room and crashes it into the gap between long off and deep cover, super knock this. 8th ODI fifty
Brathwaite to Wade, no run too full and well outside off, umpire Joe Wilson thinks it was well inside the wide line. Wade isn't impressed. Poor decision

Brathwaite to Wade, OUT swung across the line, Wade gets a thick inside edge to Brathwaite's left. Zampa took off for the run without realising the bowler moved to his left. Then it was a battle between the two, and Brathwaite runs all the way to the stumps to remove the bails at the non-striker's end. Zampa was a couple of yards short of the crease
Brathwaite to Wade, no run swing and a miss. Looked to drag the slog from well outside off towards cow corner. Excellent call by the umpire this time
Brathwaite to Wade, SIX runs what a hit to finish the innings. Too full, he gets down on one knee, gets underneath the ball and swings that across the line over wide long-on. Super hit!

4.40pm What a time for Matthew Wade to come up with a telling contribution. He was faced with a crunch situation when Shannon Gabriel dismissed Steven Smith and Glenn Maxwell in the same over, but has he steered Australia out of trouble or what? More importantly, he added 40 more after being given a reprieve when Denesh Ramdin missed the easiest of run-outs - an underarm flick at the striker's end from no more than two yards away. 270 is an excellent total

5.10pm Welcome back, folks. We aren't far away from a resumption. West Indies' top order has struggled. The last time these two sides played, it was Denesh Ramdin and Marlon Samuels who bailed them out. Can they get a better start from the openers tonight? They will have their task cut out against Mitchell Starc first up
Starc to Fletcher, no run full-blooded swing back in from outside off, beats Fletcher's drive as the ball nearly shaves the inside edge. Wow, what a start
Starc to Fletcher, no run invites the drive by bowling it full outside off, moves back in a touch, left alone

Starc to Fletcher, 2 runs loaded with risk, but he's off the mark. The ball swerves back in to take a thick inside edge that flies past square leg. Had he missed it, he would have been walking back to the dressing room
Starc to Fletcher, no run gets half-forward and eases that one to gully
Starc to Fletcher, no run floats it full and across Fletcher who pats it back down the pitch
Starc to Fletcher, 1 wide wrong line, on the seventh stump outside off, will have to re-bowl that
Starc to Fletcher, no run good carry from the length area outside off, left alone
Hazlewood to Charles, no run starts off accurately, with a back of length delivery outside off, bunted to the off side
Hazlewood to Charles, no run too straight, flicked to square leg
Hazlewood to Charles, FOUR runs slashes, and gets the boundary. There was width, Charles ensured there were no half measures and sliced it over backward point. Third man had no chance
Hazlewood to Charles, 2 runs on middle and leg, he hops back and helps it down to fine leg, where Khawaja effects a tumbling stop
Hazlewood to Charles, no run floats it full and around off stump, Charles is caught in two minds, lets it go in the end
Hazlewood to Charles, 1 run again on the pads, eased to long leg, easily done
Starc to Charles, 2 runs Zampa at square leg took the pace off that flick shot, Starc was too full and drifting into the pads, neat flick from Charles

Starc to Charles, 1 wide floats it full and well outside off, another wide. Starc is looking to cause confusion in the batsman's mind perhaps by floating one across after getting a couple of deliveries in
Starc to Charles, no run crisp drive, but Bailey dives to his right to stop that at cover point

Starc to Charles, 1 run just eludes the outstretched hands of Smith at second slip. Can't call it a chance really. This was full, Charles went after that one, but the ball kept going away from the skipper. Third man stops it. Can't call it a chance
Starc to Fletcher, no run angled full and across the batsman, who watches it go
Starc to Fletcher, no run beaten on the drive. Minimal feet movement as he shapes to play the cover drive. Starc has a few words for Fletcher
Starc to Fletcher, no run nips away off the seam as Starc angles it across Fletcher, left alone
Hazlewood to Charles, no run hit high on the thigh pad as he looks to whip it off his hip
Hazlewood to Charles, no run pushed back to the bowler off the backfoot
Hazlewood to Charles, no run once again some lift off the deck from the length area, Charles hops back to tuck that away but is hit on the thigh pad
Hazlewood to Charles, no run shapes to cut, bottom edges it to the off side
Hazlewood to Charles, no run cut away off the frontfoot but straight to backward point
Hazlewood to Charles, no run looks to work it across the line but the length ball nips back in to hit Charles on his back pad as it rolls to Wade
Starc to Fletcher, no run covers the line of that full ball as he defends to the man coming in from point
Starc to Fletcher, 1 wide full but well outside off, exercise for the umpire
Starc to Fletcher, no run hops back and bunts it gently to point

Starc to Fletcher, no run appeal for lbw. This one bends back in a shade to hit Fletcher on the pad. Was there an inside edge? Yes, clearly. Steven Smith got that right too as he prevented Starc from going for a review
Starc to Fletcher, no run beaten on the drive again. This was too full, and he was late on the stroke
Starc to Fletcher, 1 run driven wide of cover for an easy single
Starc to Charles, 1 run squeezed behind point, third man is square so one it will be
Coulter-Nile to Charles, no run skiddy short ball on the off stump, the batsman is late on the pull and is rapped on the flap of the pad
Coulter-Nile to Charles, 1 run fraction short on off again, short-arm pulled away to fine leg
Coulter-Nile to Fletcher, 1 run back of a length and angled in, short-armed away to square leg, where Zampa makes a tumbling save to his right
Coulter-Nile to Charles, 2 runs similar ball, the batsman swivels on the back foot and pulls it fairly wide of Zampa, Khawaja mops it up at deep backward square leg
Coulter-Nile to Charles, no run banged in shorter on off, cramping Charles. Pushed back to NCN
Coulter-Nile to Charles, 1 run keeps it short, this is outside off, the batsman hangs back, running a single down to third man
Hazlewood to Charles, no run very full and angled in, driven to mid-on
Hazlewood to Charles, no run back of a length, veers in, beats the flick and pings the pad
Hazlewood to Charles, SIX runs back of a length at the off stump, Charles lays into it, muscling a swipe over square leg for six
Hazlewood to Charles, no run stands up tall to a back of a length ball on off. Punched to mid-off
Hazlewood to Charles, no run back of a length on off, another firm straight-bat punch to mid-off ensues
Hazlewood to Charles, FOUR runs short and width outside off, Charles latches onto it, unleashes a rasping cut to the point boundary
Coulter-Nile to Fletcher, no run NCN hits the deck hard, short on off, fended into the pitch
Coulter-Nile to Fletcher, no run full on off, tight stuff, clipped to mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Fletcher, no run back of a length and bounces over the off stump, Fletcher loses his patience. He wants to bash it across the line over midwicket. Beaten!
Coulter-Nile to Fletcher, 1 run back of a length on off, Fletcher sits back, drops it to short extra cover, and sets off
Coulter-Nile to Charles, no run back of a length on off, dabbed away to point
Coulter-Nile to Charles, 1 run short, cramps the batsman for room, on off, turned to mid-on for another urgent single
Hazlewood to Charles, FOUR runs length and outside off, no movement, Charles just punches through the line as the ball purrs away to the cover boundary
Hazlewood to Charles, no run lifting delivery outside off, Charles leaves it be
Hazlewood to Charles, no run shorter on off, punchily blocked to short extra cover
Hazlewood to Charles, no run full on off, he looks to hit through the line again. Ends up miscuing a drive to mid-off
Hazlewood to Charles, 1 run short on off, sits back and whips through square leg
Hazlewood to Fletcher, no run short and outside off, gets on top of the bounce, playing to point
Coulter-Nile to Charles, FOUR runs Charles continues to prosper. He flies down the track, the bowler pulls his length back. Swiped to the midwicket fence
Coulter-Nile to Charles, 1 run turned to deep square leg
Coulter-Nile to Fletcher, no run short and hurled on off, punched back to the bowler
Coulter-Nile to Fletcher, no run short and veers in on off, cramped for space. The batsman fends to midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Fletcher, no run short and just outside off, slapped out to point
Coulter-Nile to Fletcher, FOUR runs Fletcher finds his release. Overpitched and outside off, Fletcher slots a drive through the covers. Drilled away with authority
Hazlewood to Charles, no run back of a length on off, presses forward and defends back to the bowler
Hazlewood to Charles, 1 run similar length but the line is wider outside off, helped down to third man
Hazlewood to Bravo, no run back of a length on off, defended to the covers
Hazlewood to Bravo, no run rising short ball on off, Bravo rides the bounce and plays towards the covers
Hazlewood to Bravo, 1 run good length and angled across off, nudged to midwicket
Marsh to Bravo, no run dug in outside off from over the wicket, Bravo shapes to pull and miscues it to mid-on
Marsh to Bravo, no run short and outside off, Bravo leaps, rises on top of the bounce and crisply punches to the covers
Marsh to Bravo, no run full and angled across the left hander, left alone
Marsh to Bravo, no run full on middle, a punchy drive to mid-off ensues
Marsh to Bravo, no run similar ball, ignored outside off
Marsh to Bravo, no run pitched up and angled across, Marsh builds the pressure further with a maiden. Left alone
Coulter-Nile to Charles, no run NCN hurls it short on off, Charles gets on top of the bounce and blocks
Coulter-Nile to Charles, no run pitched up on off, pushed to mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Charles, no run short and wide outside off, lashes a cut and finds point
Coulter-Nile to Charles, 1 run length ball on off, clipped to mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Bravo, FOUR runs Back of a length and sits up outside off, Bravo stays back and executes a wristy pull to the left of mid-on, through midwicket for four. Stylishly done!
Coulter-Nile to Bravo, no run NCN retorts with a bouncer, angled across the left-hander, Bravo sways his upper body out of the way and lets it pass over to the keeper

Marsh to Charles, no run short one on off, bursts off the surface en route to Wade as Charles hooks and misses. The ball whistles over the helmet. Not wided. Tight call. One bouncer for the over, says the square-leg umpire
Marsh to Charles, 1 run glanced to fine leg for one
Marsh to Bravo, no run pitched up and angled away outside off, left alone
Marsh to Bravo, no run short on off, worked to square leg
Marsh to Bravo, no run Marsh comes from round the stumps and pushes it full and outside off, left alone
Marsh to Bravo, no run full and angled in just a shade outside off, more leaving action from Bravo
Coulter-Nile to Charles, 1 run short and angled in, raps the batsman high on the bat. Mis-timed pull flaps to midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Bravo, 1 run good length and outside off, slapped through the covers for one
Coulter-Nile to Charles, 1 run incoming ball, draws the inside edge as the batsman wafts. The ball rolls to square leg
Coulter-Nile to Bravo, no run nice and full on middle, neatly pushed with a straight bat to mid-off
Coulter-Nile to Bravo, no run back of a length and slants away outside off, passing the outside edge of the groping bat. Bravo was opened up a touch
Coulter-Nile to Bravo, no run too full and outside off, drives to mid-off
Zampa to Charles, 1 wide dipping full toss outside leg, wide
Zampa to Charles, no run yorker, angled in, squeezed out
Zampa to Charles, no run shorter legbreak, sits back and punches to short extra cover
Zampa to Charles, no run floated on middle, Charles hangs back and drops it in front of his feet
Zampa to Charles, no run too full on middle and leg, whipped to short midwicket
Zampa to Charles, no run tossed on off, opens the bat-face and runs it to short third man
Zampa to Charles, 1 run dropped short on off, Charles sits back and forces a single to long-on
Marsh to Charles, 1 run drifting into the pads, worked to fine leg

Marsh to Bravo, OUT runs were coming in a trickle, and the pressure has got to Bravo. Marsh angles a short of length delivery back in from around the stumps, Bravo is cramped for room as he looks to run it down to third man, and can only manage a faint nick through to Matthew Wade. Straightforward decision for the umpire, but Bravo started to walk even before he raised the finger. Trouble for West Indies
Marsh to Samuels, no run woah! Rip roaring bouncer first up, Samuels sights that late, perhaps, as he ducks underneath that one. Somehow manages to avoid it
Marsh to Samuels, no run another short ball on off stump, Samuels drops his wrists, arches back and lets that go
Marsh to Samuels, 1 run uses the pace to run it down to third man for an easy single
Marsh to Charles, no run a slower one this time, Charles waits inside the crease and bunts it to the off side
Zampa to Samuels, FOUR runs beautiful shot! Played it literally off Wade's gloves. Rocks back, waits for the turn and plays it late to pick the gap behind point. Super stuff.
Zampa to Samuels, no run lunges forward to offer a dead bat
Zampa to Samuels, 1 run drifting into middle and leg, tapped to the leg side for a quick single, Samuels had to hurry, which he did
Zampa to Charles, no run good work to stop that off his own bowling by diving to his left
Zampa to Charles, no run driven with the spin to extra cover
Zampa to Charles, no run quicker delivery, there's some rip off the surface, punched to cover
Marsh to Ramdin, no run cross-seam delivery at length outside off, left alone
Marsh to Ramdin, no run this is full and tails back in from wide of the crease, Ramdin is late on a forward defensive stroke, but negotiates it in the end
Marsh to Ramdin, (no ball) oversteps in his quest for extra pace, this one's another good bouncer otherwise. Ramdin drops his gloves as he sees that through to the keeper. Free hit coming up
Marsh to Ramdin, no run can't take toll of that. Banged in short at a healthy pace, Ramdin shapes to pull but is late on it, through to the keeper
Marsh to Ramdin, no run grip off the deck, a cross-seam delivery again on off stump, Ramdin checks his shot as he pushes a touch early
Marsh to Ramdin, no run waits inside the crease and bunts that to the off side
Zampa to Charles, no run driven back to the bowler, who moves swiftly to his right to stop that
Zampa to Charles, 1 run flatter one on off, driven with the spin to extra cover
Zampa to Ramdin, no run tossed up on middle, Ramdin gets under the flight and drives, but straight to cover
Zampa to Ramdin, no run too late to get down on that one which drifts back into middle and leg, hit on the pad
Zampa to Ramdin, 1 run makes room and cuts it to deep point
Zampa to Charles, 1 run the wrong' un this time, Charles shapes to cut but makes a quick adjustment and dabs it in the end to short third man
Marsh to Pollard, no run Pollard had decided even before the ball was delivered that he would leave, the lift off the deck means the ball thuds into the bottom of his blade as he lets it go
Marsh to Pollard, no run yorker-length delivery outside off, Pollard is late on the stroke as he looks to run it down to third man
Marsh to Pollard, no run shapes back into middle, Pollard gets across and defends
Marsh to Pollard, no run shapes away off the seam from the length area on off stump, Pollard is squared up but defends that to the off side
Marsh to Pollard, 2 runs neat roll of the wrists to flick that into the gap at deep midwicket
Zampa to Ramdin, no run crunches the drive, but straight to extra cover
Zampa to Ramdin, no run too short, he cuts, but finds cover again. Pressure building
Zampa to Ramdin, no run another backfoot punch, Bailey at cover is in business again
Zampa to Ramdin, 1 run drifts this into middle from wide of the crease, this time Ramdin finally manages to punch that to the left of cover for a single
Zampa to Pollard, 1 run hammered that off the backfoot, but there's sweeper cover to cut that off. Singles won't really help, West Indies need a release. Wonder where that's going to come from
Zampa to Ramdin, 1 run driven inside-out to long-off as they amble through
Marsh to Ramdin, no run another short ball, this is getting a little predictable now, Ramdin sways out of the way
Marsh to Ramdin, no run back of length delivery outside off, watches it through to the keeper
Marsh to Ramdin, 1 run stabs forward, gets it off the outer half of the bat, ball rolls to the left of cover as they sneak through for a run
Marsh to Pollard, no run gets a good stride forward and defends
Marsh to Pollard, no run gets on top of the bounce and bunts it back down the pitch

Marsh to Pollard, no run slashes but is late on the stroke. Scoring opportunity missed again. There was enough width on offer, point was inside and it would have been four had he hit it over the infield
Zampa to Ramdin, FOUR runs edged and the ball flies into the third man boundary. Too short, Ramdin shapes to cut and gets a thick edge. Really, that's the only way a boundary was coming at the moment
Zampa to Ramdin, no run driven with the spin to the cover fielder
Zampa to Ramdin, 1 run cuts, and cuts well. Deep point fielder in business
Zampa to Pollard, 2 runs keeps low as the ball spins away from middle, Pollard wrists it into the gap at deep square leg, good running
Zampa to Pollard, no run slow turn, there's plenty of grip and bounce as Pollard takes his bottom hand off the grip as he defends
Zampa to Pollard, 2 runs muscles the pull over midwicket, Nathan Coulter-Nile does well to run around the ropes and stop that
Starc to Ramdin, no run struck on the pad by an incoming delivery that keeps low. Starc appeals, but he knew Ramdin was saved by an inside edge there
Starc to Ramdin, 1 run on the pads, worked towards deep square leg

Starc to Pollard, no run appeal for lbw as Pollard stabs outside the line of the stumps, that's what the umpire is indicating as well. Smith was about to review that until he saw the umpire agree with his suggestion. There was an inside edge too, and a big one at that
Starc to Pollard, no run full toss tailing in, pushed to mid-off
Starc to Pollard, no run pushes outside the line of the ball, gets an inside edge onto the pad again
Starc to Pollard, no run squeezed to backward point, Maxwell cuts that of
Zampa to Ramdin, no run draws him forward with flight, Ramdin blocks with a dead bat
Zampa to Ramdin, 1 run drills a low full toss to long-off
Zampa to Pollard, FOUR runs in the slot, and boom! Gets to the pitch of that in-drifter and lofts him over the bowler's head, bisects long-on and long-off
Zampa to Pollard, no run quicker one on middle and leg, defended to the leg side

Zampa to Pollard, SIX runs flat hit that would have taken the long-on fielder with it. Too short, Pollard rocks back and flat-bats the pull. Coulter-Nile threw himself in the air to take that one-handed but the ball kept travelling
Zampa to Pollard, no run slow turn away from off stump, eased to the off side
Starc to Ramdin, 1 leg bye Starc goes wide of the crease and angles it in, Ramdin gets his front leg across, his head falls over. Ungainly. Pinged on the pad
Starc to Pollard, no run speared in, cramps Pollard for room, kept out
Starc to Pollard, 2 runs yorker on off, swerves in, Pollard whips and toe-ends to deep midwicket
Starc to Pollard, 1 run strays on the hips, tucked uppishly to fine leg
Starc to Ramdin, 1 run goes too full and outside off, Ramdin reaches out and is left searching for a drive. Slices it through point
Starc to Pollard, 1 leg bye leg-stumpish ball, deflected behind square
Zampa to Holder, no run tossed on middle, Holder presses forward and blocks
Zampa to Holder, FOUR runs Holder needs just two balls in match to get open his account. A touch overpitched and outside off, driven inside-out through the covers
Zampa to Holder, no run Zampa gives this plenty of air on middle, defended
Zampa to Holder, 1 run there comes a quicker one - a googly - stabbed through point for one
Zampa to Ramdin, no run legbreak outside off, Ramdin watches it through to Wade
Starc to Holder, no run inswinging yorker, 143ks, dug out
Starc to Holder, no run full and outside off from round the wicket, left alone
Starc to Holder, 1 run low full toss outside off, carved to third man
Starc to Ramdin, no run back of a length and angled in, Ramdin camps back and blocks to the leg side
Starc to Ramdin, no run bouncer, angled in, 141ks, Starc has Ramdin ducking for cover
Starc to Ramdin, 1 run veers in full on off, clipped in front of square on the leg side
Zampa to Ramdin, no run tossed and dips on middle, Ramdin check-drives and it does not carry to a diving Smith at short extra cover
Zampa to Ramdin, 1 run pretty full on middle, pushed to long-off
Zampa to Holder, no run straighter one on off, Holder plays for the legbreak and sends an outside edge to short third man
Zampa to Holder, 1 run pushed fuller on middle, driven down the ground to long-off
Zampa to Ramdin, 1 run nicely looped on off, driven past Zampa to long-off
Zampa to Holder, no run fired straight on middle, hit back to the bowler
Starc to Ramdin, no run length ball on off, tapped back to the left-armer
Starc to Ramdin, 1 run yorker tails in on middle, jabbed out to midwicket
Starc to Holder, no run back of a length and angled in, Holder keeps back and defends to short extra cover
Starc to Holder, no run angled in full and swings away outside off, Holder chases it with a drive away from the body and misses
Starc to Holder, FOUR runs angled in and (reverse)swings away again, Holder drives and carves it in the air over backward point
Starc to Holder, no run 147.3ks yorker outside off, the ball zips through even before Holder jammed his bat down
Zampa to Ramdin, 1 run looped up and turns away outside off, Ramdin seeks to loft it. Instead, slices it in front of sweeper cover
Zampa to Holder, no run flighted on middle, blocked off the front foot
Zampa to Holder, 1 run shorter legbreak, Holder punches off the back foot to the fielder patrolling the cover fence
Zampa to Ramdin, no run slower through the air on middle, Ramdin presses forward in defence
Zampa to Ramdin, 1 run chopped from the stumps to deep cover
Zampa to Holder, 1 run tossed on middle, no turn, nudged to short extra cover. Holder scampers across for a quick single
Marsh to Holder, 1 run length and outside off, guided to third man
Marsh to Ramdin, no run back of a length on off, Ramdin shuffles across and turns the ball to short midwicket
Marsh to Ramdin, no run shortish on off, run to Maxi at backward point
Marsh to Ramdin, no run bouncer, sharp one on middle, ducked under
Marsh to Ramdin, no run full on middle, Ramdin works it to the leg side
Marsh to Ramdin, no run full on off, Ramdin plays back, again, instead of pressing forward. Marsh draws an outside edge, which rolls to Maxi at backward point
Zampa to Holder, no run flighted on middle, poked out to short extra cover
Zampa to Holder, no run tosses a legbreak outside off, slices a drive and sends an outside edge... does not carry to Maxi
Zampa to Holder, no run full on middle, blocked
Zampa to Holder, FOUR runs Holder uses his feet, makes room, collapses his back leg and drives it inside out over extra cover. That hamstring seems to be fine
Zampa to Holder, no run slides on off, defended
Zampa to Holder, 1 run Zampa drops this short on off, slapped away to long-on
Marsh to Holder, 1 run banged in and attacking the body, Holder shuffles across and works to midwicket
Marsh to Ramdin, 1 run length on off, dabbed gently to backward point
Marsh to Holder, no run full on middle, defended to short extra cover
Marsh to Holder, 2 runs short and outside off, slashed to sweeper cover
Marsh to Holder, 1 run full and straight, clipped to right of short midwicket
Marsh to Ramdin, no run back of a length and angled in, poked out to short midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Holder, no run short and angled in, Holder hops, skips, and fends it back to the bowler
Coulter-Nile to Holder, 2 runs back of a length and outside off, Holder glides it past backward point. Some work for third man, running to his right
Coulter-Nile to Holder, 1 run keeps it short and outside off, Holder is pushed back, tapping towards backward point
Coulter-Nile to Ramdin, no run much fuller at off stump, wafty little drive to mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Ramdin, no run short and angled in at off, Ramdin nearly topples over as he plays to short midwicket

Coulter-Nile to Ramdin, no run good length on off, stops on Ramdin. He drives and stabs it back to the bowler, past the outstretched left hand of NCN. The bowler, actually, finger-tipped it away. Just did not stick into the hands
Hazlewood to Holder, 1 run length on off, helped to third man

Hazlewood to Ramdin, 1 run straight in line, dab-and-run single to short midwicket. Risky single completed even as Bailey swooped down on the ball and nailed a direct hit. Holder did well to slide his bat in, despite a hamstring issue
Hazlewood to Holder, 1 run kicks up from a back of a length and outside off, Holder loosens his grip and runs it down to third man
Hazlewood to Ramdin, no run full and wicket-to-wicket line, clipped to short midwicket
Hazlewood to Ramdin, no run length on off, pushed to mid-off
Hazlewood to Ramdin, no run lifter outside off, the batsman ducks and lets it pass over to Wade. Ump Wilson does not call a wide
Coulter-Nile to Holder, no run short indipper, jabs and squirts an inside edge onto the pad
Coulter-Nile to Holder, SIX runs Holder shows some intent. He steps out and belts this length ball over mid-on for a flat six
Coulter-Nile to Holder, no run back of a length on off, steered to Maxi at backward point
Coulter-Nile to Holder, 1 wide bumper shading outside leg, whizzes over the left shoulder of Holder. This is wided
Coulter-Nile to Brathwaite, no run lifter on the leg stump, the new man half-ducks out of the way
Coulter-Nile to Brathwaite, no run back of a length and bounces over the leg stump, Carlos has a massive wipe across the line and misses. His feet went nowhere

Hazlewood to Ramdin, FOUR runs Starc has lost it in the lights! He tries to cover it with his hands and does not attempt the catch at fine leg. Leg-stump ball, picked up in the air. Starc stretched his right hand and ended up covering his face as the ball bounces to the boundary
Hazlewood to Ramdin, no run good length and outside off, waft and a miss
Hazlewood to Ramdin, 1 run short and wide outside off, slashed to the off side
Hazlewood to Brathwaite, FOUR runs bang! Back of a length and outside off, Carlos backs away and smites it over mid-off

Hazlewood to Brathwaite, 1 run Starc attempts the catch now. He drops it at short fine leg. Fullish and just a shade outside off, Carlos lap-sweeps and scoops it in the air. Starc jumps and stretches his right hand. The ball grazes it and rolls over
Hazlewood to Ramdin, no run short and outside off, chopped away, Maxi dives and stops the ball with one hand. Sprawling dive at backward point
Coulter-Nile to Brathwaite, 1 wide cutter drifts down leg, wide
Coulter-Nile to Brathwaite, 2 wide bouncer on the leg stump, Carlos hooks. Wade throws himself to his left and does not catch the ball. Was there a bit of glove, there?
Coulter-Nile to Ramdin, 1 run guided to third man
Coulter-Nile to Brathwaite, 1 run short and outside off, arches back and ramps to third man
Coulter-Nile to Ramdin, 1 run short on top of off, tapped to the covers for one
Coulter-Nile to Brathwaite, no run might have been a cutter outside off, yes it is. Carlos swings early and misses
Coulter-Nile to Brathwaite, no run back of a length on off, blocked to short extra cover

Coulter-Nile to Brathwaite, SIX runs Carlossssss pings it over square leg for six! Back of a length and outside off, possibly a slower one, Carlos holds a stable base and baseball-swings it cleanly over the boundary. Sailed away!
Marsh to Ramdin, 1 run back of a length on off, guided to short extra cover
Marsh to Brathwaite, 1 run short on middle, pulled away to deep midwicket
Marsh to Ramdin, 2 runs two is the call from Carlos as this is picked up and dispatched over midwicket
Marsh to Ramdin, SIX runs First boundary off Marsh's bowling Full and outside off, in the slot, Ramdin lofts it cleanly through the line over mid-off

Marsh to Ramdin, 2 runs Ramdin loses his shape now as he whip-pulls this short ball to short midwicket. Bailey misses a direct hit, Carlos dives at the non-striker's end. The ball skips away for overthrows
Marsh to Ramdin, 1 wide bouncer, sails over Ramdin, wide
Marsh to Ramdin, no run dug in short and outside off, Ramdin has a slog and gets a bottom edge to the keeper
Hazlewood to Brathwaite, 1 run full and heading into the pads, flicked through backward square leg
Hazlewood to Ramdin, 1 run short on off, cramps Ramdin, chopped through point
Hazlewood to Narine, no run back of a length and outside off, beats the outside edge
Hazlewood to Narine, no run back of a length on off, swiped to mid-on
Hazlewood to Narine, 2 runs full toss on middle, whipped away, Finch tumbles to his right from wide long-on, great commitment. He saves a couple of runs for Australia
Marsh to Ramdin, 1 run short on off, Ramdin gets on top of the bounce and pulls to deep midwicket

Marsh to Narine, no run back of a length and angled in from round the stumps, hit back to the bowler. Marsh got his hands to it, but the ball did not roll back onto the stumps. Ramdin had backed up a fair bit
Marsh to Narine, no run Narine opens the bat-face and steers it to point
Marsh to Narine, FOUR runs offbreak from Marsh, Narine comes down the track and slices over extra cover, beats long-off running to his right. Narine has come out swinging
Marsh to Narine, 1 run Narine leans back and slashes this short ball through the covers
Marsh to Ramdin, no run Marsh shortens his length as Ramdin dances out. Flat-batted back to the bowler
Hazlewood to Narine, no run short and outside off, left alone
Hazlewood to Narine, 1 run back of a length on middle, Narine slogs and ekes out an inside edge, which ricochets off the pad to Wade
Hazlewood to Benn, 1 run full on middle, Hazlewood draws an outside edge, wanders away to third man
Hazlewood to Narine, FOUR runs Narine connects with the leg-side slog. Full on middle, swiped over midwicket

Hazlewood to Narine, 1 run Hazlewood can't cling onto the return catch! Good length on middle, Narine, having stepped outside leg, drills it back to the bowler. Hazlewood stuck his right hand out, but could only tip it over to long-off
Starc to Narine, 2 runs Narine stands tall to meet this short ball outside off, punched to deep cover
Starc to Narine, FOUR runs inswinging yorker on middle, Narine pushes and sends an inside edge to the long leg boundary
Starc to Narine, no run Narine takes a trip outside leg, Starc fires it full and outside off. Narine can't reach out. Leaves it alone
Starc to Narine, no run back of a length and holds its line outside off, 146ks, left alone again
Starc to Narine, FOUR runs Starc hunts for another yorker, this is hurled on the leg stump, tickled fine past the diving Wade for four
Starc to Narine, no run full and straight, Narine hangs back and flicks to midwicket
Hazlewood to Benn, 1 run gets a thick inside edge to mid-on, they scamper through for a single
Hazlewood to Gabriel, 1 run swings across the line, Gabriel gets an inside edge towards deep midwicket

8.40pm Justin Langer is a visibly delighted man. His first tournament as coach ends in victory. West Indies' dream run ends, but to be fair, they ran into a ruthless Australian bowling attack. Mitch Marsh did the damage upfront in an excellent opening burst full of variations, while Josh Hazlewood came into his own at the end. West Indies needed meaningful partnerships, but there was none. A case of stage fright perhaps? Marlon Samuels was the key, but onc

So a journey that started on June 3, ends three and a half weeks later. Hope you've enjoyed our ball-by-ball coverage. Plenty of cricket coming up in the Caribbean. The CPL kicks off on June 29. West Indies then host India for four Tests starting July 21. Until next time, it's goodbye from all of us here. Cheers!
Australia won by 58 runs
Player of the match is Mitchell Marsh, AUS
